name: Larry's Bad Day
description:
This game was made in under 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 following the theme: 'roots'. You can find my submission here.

You control Larry, a head Louse who has found its way onto the head of an irritable human. By laying eggs on the roots of the human's hair and increasing your numbers, you can overwhelm the human and escape to live another day! 

Controls WASD / Arrow KeysMoveELay egg on rootQGather EssenceCredits:

RoyaltyFreePlanet - Music
